◆ _IsWithinDist()

bool WorldObject::_IsWithinDist ( WorldObject const *  obj,
float  dist2compare,
bool  is3D,
bool  useBoundingRadius = true 
) const
privatevirtual

Reimplemented in GameObject.

1218{
1219 float sizefactor = useBoundingRadius ? GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize() : 0.0f;
1220 float maxdist = dist2compare + sizefactor;
1221
1222 if (m_transport && obj->GetTransport() && obj->GetTransport()->GetGUID() == m_transport->GetGUID())
1223 {
1224 float dtx = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionX - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionX;
1225 float dty = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionY - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionY;
1226 float disttsq = dtx * dtx + dty * dty;
1227 if (is3D)
1228 {
1229 float dtz = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionZ - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionZ;
1230 disttsq += dtz * dtz;
1231 }
1232 return disttsq < (maxdist * maxdist);
1233 }
1234
1235 float dx = GetPositionX() - obj->GetPositionX();
1236 float dy = GetPositionY() - obj->GetPositionY();
1237 float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1238 if (is3D)
1239 {
1240 float dz = GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ();
1241 distsq += dz * dz;
1242 }
1243
1244 return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1245}

◆ AddToNotify()

void WorldObject::AddToNotify ( uint16  f)
2992{
2993 if (!(m_notifyflags & f))
2994 if (Unit* u = ToUnit())
2995 {
2996 if (f & NOTIFY_VISIBILITY_CHANGED)
2997 {
2998 uint32 EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY = u->FindMap() ? DynamicVisibilityMgr::GetVisibilityNotifyDelay(u->FindMap()->GetEntry()->map_type) : 1000;
2999
3000 uint32 diff = getMSTimeDiff(u->m_last_notify_mstime, GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count());
3001 if (diff >= EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY / 2)
3002 EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY /= 2;
3003 else
3004 EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY -= diff;
3005 u->m_delayed_unit_relocation_timer = EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY;
3006 u->m_last_notify_mstime = GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count() + EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY - 1;
3007 }
3008 else if (f & NOTIFY_AI_RELOCATION)
3009 {
3010 u->m_delayed_unit_ai_notify_timer = u->FindMap() ? DynamicVisibilityMgr::GetAINotifyDelay(u->FindMap()->GetEntry()->map_type) : 500;
3011 }
3012
3013 m_notifyflags |= f;
3014 }
3015}

◆ CanDetect()

bool WorldObject::CanDetect ( WorldObject const *  obj,
bool  ignoreStealth,
bool  checkClient,
bool  checkAlert = false 
) const
private
1892{
1893 WorldObject const* seer = this;
1894
1895 // Pets don't have detection, they use the detection of their masters
1896 if (Unit const* thisUnit = ToUnit())
1897 if (Unit* controller = thisUnit->GetCharmerOrOwner())
1898 seer = controller;
1899
1900 if (obj->IsAlwaysDetectableFor(seer) || GetEntry() == WORLD_TRIGGER) // xinef: World Trigger can detect all objects, used for wild gameobjects without owner!
1901 return true;
1902
1903 if (!ignoreStealth)
1904 {
1905 if (!seer->CanDetectInvisibilityOf(obj)) // xinef: added ignoreStealth, allow AoE spells to hit invisible targets!
1906 {
1907 return false;
1908 }
1909
1910 if (!seer->CanDetectStealthOf(obj, checkAlert))
1911 {
1912 // xinef: ignore units players have at client, this cant be cheated!
1913 if (checkClient)
1914 {
1915 if (!IsPlayer() || !ToPlayer()->HaveAtClient(obj))
1916 return false;
1917 }
1918 else
1919 return false;
1920 }
1921 }
1922
1923 return true;
1924}

#define WORLD_TRIGGER

◆ CanDetectInvisibilityOf()

bool WorldObject::CanDetectInvisibilityOf ( WorldObject const *  obj) const
private
1927{
1928 uint32 mask = obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() & m_invisibilityDetect.GetFlags();
1929 // xinef: include invisible flags of caster in the mask, 2 invisible objects should be able to detect eachother
1930 mask |= obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() & m_invisibility.GetFlags();
1931
1932 // Check for not detected types
1933 if (mask != obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags())
1934 return false;
1935
1936 // It isn't possible in invisibility to detect something that can't detect the invisible object
1937 // (it's at least true for spell: 66)
1938 // It seems like that only Units are affected by this check (couldn't see arena doors with preparation invisibility)
1939 if (obj->ToUnit())
1940 {
1941 // Permanently invisible creatures should be able to engage non-invisible targets.
1942 // ex. Skulking Witch (20882) / Greater Invisibility (16380)
1943 bool isPermInvisibleCreature = false;
1944 if (Creature const* baseObj = ToCreature())
1945 {
1946 auto auraEffects = baseObj->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY);
1947 for (auto const effect : auraEffects)
1948 {
1949 if (SpellInfo const* spell = effect->GetSpellInfo())
1950 {
1951 if (spell->GetMaxDuration() == -1)
1952 {
1953 isPermInvisibleCreature = true;
1954 }
1955 }
1956 }
1957 }
1958
1959 if (!isPermInvisibleCreature)
1960 {
1961 uint32 objMask = m_invisibility.GetFlags() & obj->m_invisibilityDetect.GetFlags();
1962 // xinef: include invisible flags of caster in the mask, 2 invisible objects should be able to detect eachother
1963 objMask |= m_invisibility.GetFlags() & obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags();
1964 if (objMask != m_invisibility.GetFlags())
1965 return false;
1966 }
1967 }
1968
1969 for (uint32 i = 0; i < TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES; ++i)
1970 {
1971 if (!(mask & (1 << i)))
1972 continue;
1973
1974 // xinef: visible for the same invisibility type:
1975 if (m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i)) && obj->m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i)))
1976 continue;
1977
1978 int32 objInvisibilityValue = obj->m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i));
1979 int32 ownInvisibilityDetectValue = m_invisibilityDetect.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i));
1980
1981 // Too low value to detect
1982 if (ownInvisibilityDetectValue < objInvisibilityValue)
1983 return false;
1984 }
1985
1986 return true;
1987}
int32
std::int32_t int32
Definition Define.h:103
InvisibilityType
InvisibilityType
Definition SharedDefines.h:1254
TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES
@ TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES

◆ CanDetectStealthOf()

bool WorldObject::CanDetectStealthOf ( WorldObject const *  obj,
bool  checkAlert = false 
) const
private
1990{
1991 // Combat reach is the minimal distance (both in front and behind),
1992 // and it is also used in the range calculation.
1993 // One stealth point increases the visibility range by 0.3 yard.
1994
1995 if (!obj->m_stealth.GetFlags())
1996 return true;
1997
1998 // dead players shouldnt be able to detect stealth on arenas
1999 if (isType(TYPEMASK_PLAYER))
2000 if (!ToPlayer()->IsAlive())
2001 return false;
2002
2003 float distance = GetExactDist(obj);
2004 float combatReach = 0.0f;
2005
2006 if (IsUnit())
2007 combatReach = ((Unit*)this)->GetCombatReach();
2008
2009 if (distance < combatReach)
2010 return true;
2011
2012 if (!HasInArc(M_PI, obj))
2013 return false;
2014
2015 for (uint32 i = 0; i < TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES; ++i)
2016 {
2017 if (!(obj->m_stealth.GetFlags() & (1 << i)))
2018 continue;
2019
2020 if (IsUnit())
2021 if (((Unit*)this)->HasAuraTypeWithMiscvalue(SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH, i))
2022 return true;
2023
2024 // Starting points
2025 int32 detectionValue = 30;
2026
2027 // Level difference: 5 point / level, starting from level 1.
2028 // There may be spells for this and the starting points too, but
2029 // not in the DBCs of the client.
2030 detectionValue += int32(getLevelForTarget(obj) - 1) * 5;
2031
2032 // Apply modifiers
2033 detectionValue += m_stealthDetect.GetValue(StealthType(i));
2034 if (obj->isType(TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT))
2035 {
2036 detectionValue += 30; // pussywizard: increase detection range for gameobjects (ie. traps)
2037 if (Unit* owner = ((GameObject*)obj)->GetOwner())
2038 detectionValue -= int32(owner->getLevelForTarget(this) - 1) * 5;
2039 }
2040
2041 detectionValue -= obj->m_stealth.GetValue(StealthType(i));
2042
2043 // Calculate max distance
2044 float visibilityRange = float(detectionValue) * 0.3f + combatReach;
2045
2046 Unit const* unit = ToUnit();
2047
2048 // If this unit is an NPC then player detect range doesn't apply
2049 if (unit && unit->IsPlayer() && visibilityRange > MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE)
2050 visibilityRange = MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE;
2051
2052 if (checkAlert)
2053 visibilityRange += (visibilityRange * 0.08f) + 1.5f;
2054
2055 Unit const* targetUnit = obj->ToUnit();
2056
2057 // If checking for alert, and creature's visibility range is greater than aggro distance, No alert
2058 if (checkAlert && unit && unit->ToCreature() && visibilityRange >= unit->ToCreature()->GetAttackDistance(targetUnit) + unit->ToCreature()->m_CombatDistance)
2059 return false;
2060
2061 if (distance > visibilityRange)
2062 return false;
2063 }
2064
2065 return true;
2066}
TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT
@ TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT
Definition ObjectGuid.h:51
TYPEMASK_PLAYER
@ TYPEMASK_PLAYER
Definition ObjectGuid.h:50
StealthType
StealthType
Definition SharedDefines.h:1246
TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES
@ TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES
Definition SharedDefines.h:1250
SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH
@ SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH
Definition SpellAuraDefines.h:291
MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE
#define MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE
Definition Unit.h:631
Creature::GetAttackDistance
float GetAttackDistance(Unit const *player) const
Definition Creature.cpp:3596
Creature::m_CombatDistance
float m_CombatDistance
Definition Creature.h:371
GameObject
Definition GameObject.h:120

Definition Object.h:208

Definition Object.h:128

Definition Object.h:523
WorldObject::m_stealth
FlaggedValuesArray32< int32, uint32, StealthType, TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES > m_stealth
Definition Object.h:522
WorldObject::getLevelForTarget
virtual uint8 getLevelForTarget(WorldObject const *) const
Definition Object.h:503
Position::GetExactDist
float GetExactDist(float x, float y, float z) const
Definition Position.h:177
Position::HasInArc

Definition Position.cpp:141

References Creature::GetAttackDistance(), Position::GetExactDist(), FlaggedValuesArray32< T_VALUES, T_FLAGS, FLAG_TYPE, ARRAY_SIZE >::GetFlags(), getLevelForTarget(), FlaggedValuesArray32< T_VALUES, T_FLAGS, FLAG_TYPE, ARRAY_SIZE >::GetValue(), Position::HasInArc(), Object::IsPlayer(), Object::isType(), Object::IsUnit(), Creature::m_CombatDistance, m_stealth, m_stealthDetect, MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE, SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH, Object::ToCreature(), Object::ToPlayer(), TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES, Object::ToUnit(), TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT, and TYPEMASK_PLAYER.

◆ CanNeverSee()

bool WorldObject::CanNeverSee ( WorldObject const *  obj) const
private
1885{
1886 if (IsCreature() && obj->IsCreature())
1887 return GetMap() != obj->GetMap() || (!InSamePhase(obj) && ToUnit()->GetVehicleBase() != obj && this != obj->ToUnit()->GetVehicleBase());

1889}

◆ CanSeeOrDetect()

bool WorldObject::CanSeeOrDetect ( WorldObject const *  obj,
bool  ignoreStealth = false,
bool  distanceCheck = false,
bool  checkAlert = false 
) const
1738{
1739 if (this == obj)
1740 return true;
1741
1742 if (obj->IsNeverVisible() || CanNeverSee(obj))
1743 return false;
1744
1745 if (obj->IsAlwaysVisibleFor(this) || CanAlwaysSee(obj))
1746 return true;
1747
1748 // Creature scripts
1749 if (Creature const* cObj = obj->ToCreature())
1750 {
1751 if (Player const* player = ToPlayer())
1752 {
1753 if (cObj->IsAIEnabled && !cObj->AI()->CanBeSeen(player))
1754 {
1755 return false;
1756 }
1757
1758 ConditionList conditions = sConditionMgr->GetConditionsForNotGroupedEntry(CONDITION_SOURCE_TYPE_CREATURE_VISIBILITY, cObj->GetEntry());
1759 if (!sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions((WorldObject*)this, (WorldObject*)obj, conditions))
1760 {
1761 return false;
1762 }
1763 }
1764 }
1765
1766 // Gameobject scripts
1767 if (GameObject const* goObj = obj->ToGameObject())
1768 {
1769 if (ToPlayer() && !goObj->AI()->CanBeSeen(ToPlayer()))
1770 {
1771 return false;
1772 }
1773 }
1774
1775 // pussywizard: arena spectator
1776 if (obj->IsPlayer())
1777 if (((Player const*)obj)->IsSpectator() && ((Player const*)obj)->FindMap()->IsBattleArena())
1778 return false;
1779
1780 bool corpseVisibility = false;
1781 if (distanceCheck)
1782 {
1783 bool corpseCheck = false;
1784 WorldObject const* viewpoint = this;
1785 if (Player const* thisPlayer = ToPlayer())
1786 {
1787 if (Creature const* creature = obj->ToCreature())
1788 {
1789 if (TempSummon const* tempSummon = creature->ToTempSummon())
1790 {
1791 if (tempSummon->IsVisibleBySummonerOnly() && GetGUID() != tempSummon->GetSummonerGUID())
1792 {
1793 return false;
1794 }
1795 }
1796 }
1797
1798 if (thisPlayer->isDead() && thisPlayer->GetHealth() > 0 && // Cheap way to check for ghost state
1799 !(obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST))
1800 {
1801 if (Corpse* corpse = thisPlayer->GetCorpse())
1802 {
1803 corpseCheck = true;
1804 if (corpse->IsWithinDist(thisPlayer, GetSightRange(obj), false))
1805 if (corpse->IsWithinDist(obj, GetSightRange(obj), false))
1806 corpseVisibility = true;
1807 }
1808 }
1809
1810 // our additional checks
1811 if (Unit const* target = obj->ToUnit())
1812 {
1813 // xinef: don't allow to detect vehicle accessory if you can't see vehicle base!
1814 if (Unit const* vehicle = target->GetVehicleBase())
1815 if (!thisPlayer->HaveAtClient(vehicle))
1816 return false;
1817
1818 // pussywizard: during arena preparation, don't allow to detect pets if can't see its owner (spoils enemy arena frames)
1819 if (target->IsPet() && target->GetOwnerGUID() && target->FindMap()->IsBattleArena() && GetGUID() != target->GetOwnerGUID())
1820 if (BattlegroundMap* bgmap = target->FindMap()->ToBattlegroundMap())
1821 if (Battleground* bg = bgmap->GetBG())
1822 if (bg->GetStatus() < STATUS_IN_PROGRESS && !thisPlayer->HaveAtClient(target->GetOwnerGUID()))
1823 return false;
1824 }
1825
1826 if (thisPlayer->GetViewpoint())
1827 viewpoint = thisPlayer->GetViewpoint();
1828
1829 if (thisPlayer->GetFarSightDistance() && !thisPlayer->isInFront(obj))
1830 {
1831 return false;
1832 }
1833 }
1834
1835 // Xinef: check reversely obj vs viewpoint, object could be a gameObject which overrides _IsWithinDist function to include gameobject size
1836 if (!corpseCheck && !viewpoint->IsWithinDist(obj, GetSightRange(obj), true))
1837 return false;
1838 }
1839
1840 // GM visibility off or hidden NPC
1841 if (!obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM))
1842 {
1843 // Stop checking other things for GMs
1844 if (m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM))
1845 return true;
1846 }
1847 else
1848 return m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM) >= obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM);
1849
1850 // Ghost players, Spirit Healers, and some other NPCs
1851 if (!corpseVisibility && !(obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST)))
1852 {
1853 // Alive players can see dead players in some cases, but other objects can't do that
1854 if (Player const* thisPlayer = ToPlayer())
1855 {
1856 if (Player const* objPlayer = obj->ToPlayer())
1857 {
1858 if (thisPlayer->GetTeamId() != objPlayer->GetTeamId() || !thisPlayer->IsGroupVisibleFor(objPlayer))
1859 return false;
1860 }
1861 else
1862 return false;
1863 }
1864 else
1865 return false;
1866 }
1867
1868 if (obj->IsInvisibleDueToDespawn())
1869 return false;
1870
1871 // pussywizard: arena spectator
1872 if (this->IsPlayer())
1873 if (((Player const*)this)->IsSpectator() && ((Player const*)this)->FindMap()->IsBattleArena() && (obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() || obj->m_stealth.GetFlags()))
1874 return false;
1875
1876 if (!CanDetect(obj, ignoreStealth, !distanceCheck, checkAlert))
1877 {
1878 return false;
1879 }
1880
1881 return true;
1882}
STATUS_IN_PROGRESS
@ STATUS_IN_PROGRESS

◆ DestroyForNearbyPlayers()

void WorldObject::DestroyForNearbyPlayers ( )

2958{
2959 if (!IsInWorld())
2960 return;
2961
2962 std::list<Player*> targets;
2963 Acore::AnyPlayerInObjectRangeCheck check(this, GetVisibilityRange() + VISIBILITY_COMPENSATION, false);
2964 Acore::PlayerListSearcherWithSharedVision<Acore::AnyPlayerInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(this, targets, check);
2965 Cell::VisitWorldObjects(this, searcher, GetVisibilityRange());
2966 for (std::list<Player*>::const_iterator iter = targets.begin(); iter != targets.end(); ++iter)
2967 {
2968 Player* player = (*iter);
2969
2970 if (player == this)
2971 continue;
2972
2973 if (!player->HaveAtClient(this))
2974 continue;
2975
2976 if (IsUnit() && ((Unit*)this)->GetCharmerGUID() == player->GetGUID())
2977 continue;
2978
2979 DestroyForPlayer(player);
2980 player->m_clientGUIDs.erase(GetGUID());
2981 }
2982}

2725 }

2729 if (force)
2730 {

2732 y = this->GetPositionY();
2733 z = this->GetPositionZ();

2735 }

2737 }
2738 return true;

◆ GetDistanceOrder()

bool WorldObject::GetDistanceOrder ( WorldObject const *  obj1,
WorldObject const *  obj2,
bool  is3D = true 
) const
1393{
1394 float dx1 = GetPositionX() - obj1->GetPositionX();
1395 float dy1 = GetPositionY() - obj1->GetPositionY();
1396 float distsq1 = dx1 * dx1 + dy1 * dy1;
1397 if (is3D)
1398 {
1399 float dz1 = GetPositionZ() - obj1->GetPositionZ();
1400 distsq1 += dz1 * dz1;
1401 }
1402
1403 float dx2 = GetPositionX() - obj2->GetPositionX();
1404 float dy2 = GetPositionY() - obj2->GetPositionY();
1405 float distsq2 = dx2 * dx2 + dy2 * dy2;
1406 if (is3D)
1407 {
1408 float dz2 = GetPositionZ() - obj2->GetPositionZ();
1409 distsq2 += dz2 * dz2;
1410 }
1411
1412 return distsq1 < distsq2;
1413}

References Position::GetPositionX(), Position::GetPositionY(), and Position::GetPositionZ().

Referenced by Acore::ObjectDistanceOrderPred::operator()(), and Spell::SearchChainTargets().

◆ GetDistanceZ()

float WorldObject::GetDistanceZ ( WorldObject const *  obj) const
1210{
1211 float dz = std::fabs(GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ());
1212 float sizefactor = GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize();
1213 float dist = dz - sizefactor;
1214 return (dist > 0 ? dist : 0);
1215}

References GetObjectSize(), and Position::GetPositionZ().

◆ GetFirstCollisionPosition() [1/3]

Position WorldObject::GetFirstCollisionPosition ( float  destX,
float  destY,
float  destZ 
)
2852{
2853 Position pos = GetPosition();
2854 auto distance = GetExactDistSq(destX,destY,destZ);
2855
2856 auto dx = destX - pos.GetPositionX();
2857 auto dy = destY - pos.GetPositionY();
2858
2859 auto ang = std::atan2(dy, dx);
2860 ang = (ang >= 0) ? ang : 2 * M_PI + ang;
2861
2862 MovePositionToFirstCollision(pos, distance, ang);
2863 return pos;
2864}

◆ GetFirstCollisionPosition() [3/3]

Position WorldObject::GetFirstCollisionPosition ( float  startX,
float  startY,
float  startZ,
float  destX,
float  destY 
)
2837{
2838 auto dx = destX - startX;
2839 auto dy = destY - startY;
2840
2841 auto ang = std::atan2(dy, dx);
2842 ang = (ang >= 0) ? ang : 2 * M_PI + ang;
2843 Position pos = Position(startX, startY, startZ, ang);
2844
2845 auto distance = pos.GetExactDist2d(destX,destY);
2846
2847 MovePositionToFirstCollision(pos, distance, ang);
2848 return pos;
2849}

1637 {
1638 if (ToPlayer()->GetCinematicMgr()->IsOnCinematic())
1639 {
1640 return DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_INSTANCE;
1641 }

1647 }

◆ GetHitSpherePointFor() [2/2]

Position WorldObject::GetHitSpherePointFor ( Position const &  dest,
Optional< float >  collisionHeight = { },
Optional< float >  combatReach = { } 
) const
1248{
1249 G3D::Vector3 vThis(GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ() + (collisionHeight ? *collisionHeight : GetCollisionHeight()));
1250 G3D::Vector3 vObj(dest.GetPositionX(), dest.GetPositionY(), dest.GetPositionZ());
1251 G3D::Vector3 contactPoint = vThis + (vObj - vThis).directionOrZero() * std::min(dest.GetExactDist(this), (combatReach ? *combatReach : GetCombatReach()));
1252
1253 return Position(contactPoint.x, contactPoint.y, contactPoint.z, GetAngle(contactPoint.x, contactPoint.y));
1254}

◆ GetMinHeightInWater()

float WorldObject::GetMinHeightInWater ( ) const

Get the minimum height of a object that should be in water to start floating/swim.

Returns
float
1555{
1556 // have a fun with Archimedes' formula
1557 auto height = GetCollisionHeight();
1558 auto width = GetCollisionWidth();
1559 auto weight = getWeight(height, width, 1040); // avg human specific weight
1560 auto heightOutOfWater = getOutOfWater(width, weight, 10202) * 4.0f; // avg human density
1561 auto heightInWater = height - heightOutOfWater;
1562 return (height > heightInWater ? heightInWater : (height - (height / 3)));
1563}
getWeight

◆ GetNearPoint()

void WorldObject::GetNearPoint ( WorldObject const *  searcher,
float &  x,
float &  y,
float &  z,
float  searcher_size,
float  distance2d,
float  absAngle,
float  controlZ = 0,
Position const *  startPos = nullptr 
) const
2640{
2641 GetNearPoint2D(x, y, distance2d + searcher_size, absAngle, startPos);
2642 z = GetPositionZ();
2643
2644 if (searcher)
2645 {
2646 if (Unit const* unit = searcher->ToUnit(); Unit const* target = ToUnit())
2647 {
2648 if (unit && target && unit->IsInWater() && target->IsInWater())
2649 {
2650 // if the searcher is in water
2651 // we have no ground so we can
2652 // set the target height to the
2653 // z-coord to keep the searcher
2654 // at the correct height (face to face)
2655 z += GetCollisionHeight() - unit->GetCollisionHeight();
2656 }
2657 }
2658 searcher->UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2659 }
2660 else
2661 {
2662 UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2663 }
2664
2665 // if detection disabled, return first point
2666 if (!sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_DETECT_POS_COLLISION))
2667 return;
2668
2669 // return if the point is already in LoS
2670 if (!controlZ && IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2671 return;
2672
2673 // remember first point
2674 float first_x = x;
2675 float first_y = y;
2676 float first_z = z;
2677
2678 // loop in a circle to look for a point in LoS using small steps
2679 for (float angle = float(M_PI) / 8; angle < float(M_PI) * 2; angle += float(M_PI) / 8)
2680 {
2681 GetNearPoint2D(x, y, distance2d + searcher_size, absAngle + angle, startPos);
2682 z = GetPositionZ();
2683 UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2684 if (controlZ && fabsf(GetPositionZ() - z) > controlZ)
2685 continue;
2686
2687 if (IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2688 return;
2689 }
2690
2691 // still not in LoS, give up and return first position found
2692 if (startPos)
2693 {
2694 x = searcher->GetPositionX();
2695 y = searcher->GetPositionY();
2696 z = searcher->GetPositionZ();
2697 }
2698 else
2699 {
2700 x = first_x;
2701 y = first_y;
2702 z = first_z;
2703 }
2704}

◆ GetNearPoint2D() [2/2]

void WorldObject::GetNearPoint2D ( WorldObject const *  searcher,
float &  x,
float &  y,
float  distance,
float  absAngle,
Position const *  startPos = nullptr 
) const
2603{
2604 float effectiveReach = GetCombatReach();
2605
2606 if (searcher)
2607 {
2608 effectiveReach += searcher->GetCombatReach();
2609
2610 if (this != searcher)
2611 {
2612 float myHover = 0.0f, searcherHover = 0.0f;
2613 if (Unit const* unit = ToUnit())
2614 myHover = unit->GetHoverHeight();
2615 if (Unit const* searchUnit = searcher->ToUnit())
2616 searcherHover = searchUnit->GetHoverHeight();
2617
2618 float hoverDelta = myHover - searcherHover;
2619 if (hoverDelta != 0.0f)
2620 effectiveReach = std::sqrt(std::max(effectiveReach * effectiveReach - hoverDelta * hoverDelta, 0.0f));
2621 }
2622 }
2623
2624 float positionX = startPos ? startPos->GetPositionX() : GetPositionX();
2625 float positionY = startPos ? startPos->GetPositionY() : GetPositionY();
2626
2627 x = positionX + (effectiveReach + distance2d) * std::cos(absAngle);
2628 y = positionY + (effectiveReach + distance2d) * std::sin(absAngle);
2629
2630 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(x);
2631 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(y);
2632}
Acore::NormalizeMapCoord
void NormalizeMapCoord(float &c)
Definition GridDefines.h:207

References GetCombatReach(), Unit::GetHoverHeight(), Position::GetPositionX(), Position::GetPositionY(), Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(), and Object::ToUnit().

◆ GetRandomPoint() [2/2]

void WorldObject::GetRandomPoint ( const Position &  srcPos,
float  distance,
float &  rand_x,
float &  rand_y,
float &  rand_z 
) const
1514{
1515 if (!distance)
1516 {
1517 pos.GetPosition(rand_x, rand_y, rand_z);
1518 return;
1519 }
1520
1521 // angle to face `obj` to `this`
1522 float angle = (float)rand_norm() * static_cast<float>(2 * M_PI);
1523 float new_dist = (float)rand_norm() * static_cast<float>(distance);
1524
1525 rand_x = pos.m_positionX + new_dist * cos(angle);
1526 rand_y = pos.m_positionY + new_dist * std::sin(angle);
1527 rand_z = pos.m_positionZ;
1528
1529 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(rand_x);
1530 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(rand_y);
1531 UpdateGroundPositionZ(rand_x, rand_y, rand_z); // update to LOS height if available
1532}

◆ GetSightRange()

float WorldObject::GetSightRange ( WorldObject const *  target = nullptr) const

1685 if (ToUnit())

1699 return VISIBILITY_DIST_WINTERGRASP + VISIBILITY_INC_FOR_GOBJECTS;
1700 }
1701 else if (target->IsVisibilityOverridden())
1702 {
1703 return *target->m_visibilityDistanceOverride;
1704 }
1705 else if (ToPlayer()->GetCinematicMgr()->IsOnCinematic())
1706 {
1707 return DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_INSTANCE;
1708 }
1709 else
1710 {
1711 return GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange() + VISIBILITY_INC_FOR_GOBJECTS;
1712 }
1713 }
1714
1715 return IsInWintergrasp() && target->IsInWintergrasp() ? VISIBILITY_DIST_WINTERGRASP : GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1716 }
1717 return IsInWintergrasp() ? VISIBILITY_DIST_WINTERGRASP : GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1718 }
1719 else if (ToCreature())
1720 {
1721 return ToCreature()->m_SightDistance;
1722 }
1723 else
1724 {
1725 return SIGHT_RANGE_UNIT;
1726 }
1727 }
1728
1729 if (ToDynObject() && isActiveObject())
1730 {
1731 return GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1732 }
1733
1734 return 0.0f;
1735}
SIGHT_RANGE_UNIT
#define SIGHT_RANGE_UNIT
Definition ObjectDefines.h:32
VISIBILITY_INC_FOR_GOBJECTS
#define VISIBILITY_INC_FOR_GOBJECTS
Definition ObjectDefines.h:28

◆ IsInBetween()

bool WorldObject::IsInBetween ( WorldObject const *  obj1,
WorldObject const *  obj2,
float  size = 0 
) const
1482{
1483 if (!obj1 || !obj2)
1484 return false;
1485
1486 if (!size)
1487 size = GetObjectSize() / 2;
1488
1489 float pdist = obj1->GetExactDist2dSq(obj2) + size / 2.0f;
1490 if (GetExactDist2dSq(obj1) >= pdist || GetExactDist2dSq(obj2) >= pdist)
1491 return false;
1492
1493 if (G3D::fuzzyEq(obj1->GetPositionX(), obj2->GetPositionX()))
1494 return GetPositionX() >= obj1->GetPositionX() - size && GetPositionX() <= obj1->GetPositionX() + size;
1495
1496 float A = (obj2->GetPositionY() - obj1->GetPositionY()) / (obj2->GetPositionX() - obj1->GetPositionX());
1497 float B = -1;
1498 float C = obj1->GetPositionY() - A * obj1->GetPositionX();
1499 float dist = std::fabs(A * GetPositionX() + B * GetPositionY() + C) / std::sqrt(A * A + B * B);
1500 return dist <= size;
1501}
Position::GetExactDist2dSq
float GetExactDist2dSq(const float x, const float y) const
Definition Position.h:156

References Position::GetExactDist2dSq(), GetObjectSize(), Position::GetPositionX(), and Position::GetPositionY().

Referenced by TwilightCutterSelector::operator()().

◆ IsInRange()

bool WorldObject::IsInRange ( WorldObject const *  obj,
float  minRange,
float  maxRange,
bool  is3D = true 
) const
1416{
1417 float dx = GetPositionX() - obj->GetPositionX();
1418 float dy = GetPositionY() - obj->GetPositionY();
1419 float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1420 if (is3D)
1421 {
1422 float dz = GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ();
1423 distsq += dz * dz;
1424 }
1425
1426 float sizefactor = GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize();
1427
1428 // check only for real range
1429 if (minRange > 0.0f)
1430 {
1431 float mindist = minRange + sizefactor;
1432 if (distsq < mindist * mindist)
1433 return false;
1434 }
1435
1436 float maxdist = maxRange + sizefactor;
1437 return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1438}

References GetObjectSize(), Position::GetPositionX(), Position::GetPositionY(), and Position::GetPositionZ().

Referenced by SmartScript::GetTargets(), npc_anachronos_the_ancient::npc_anachronos_the_ancientAI::HandleAnimation(), FarthestTargetSelector::operator()(), SmartScript::ProcessEvent(), npc_varian_wrynn::npc_varian_wrynnAI::UpdateAI(), npc_thrall_bfu::npc_thrall_bfuAI::UpdateAI(), boss_grand_champion::boss_grand_championAI::UpdateAI(), and boss_gathios_the_shatterer::UpdateAI().

◆ IsInRange2d()

bool WorldObject::IsInRange2d ( float  x,
float  y,
float  minRange,
float  maxRange 
) const
1441{
1442 float dx = GetPositionX() - x;
1443 float dy = GetPositionY() - y;
1444 float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1445
1446 float sizefactor = GetObjectSize();
1447
1448 // check only for real range
1449 if (minRange > 0.0f)
1450 {
1451 float mindist = minRange + sizefactor;
1452 if (distsq < mindist * mindist)
1453 return false;
1454 }
1455
1456 float maxdist = maxRange + sizefactor;
1457 return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1458}

◆ IsInRange3d()

bool WorldObject::IsInRange3d ( float  x,
float  y,
float  z,
float  minRange,
float  maxRange 
) const
1461{
1462 float dx = GetPositionX() - x;
1463 float dy = GetPositionY() - y;
1464 float dz = GetPositionZ() - z;
1465 float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz;
1466
1467 float sizefactor = GetObjectSize();
1468
1469 // check only for real range
1470 if (minRange > 0.0f)
1471 {
1472 float mindist = minRange + sizefactor;
1473 if (distsq < mindist * mindist)
1474 return false;
1475 }
1476
1477 float maxdist = maxRange + sizefactor;
1478 return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1479}

◆ MovePosition()

void WorldObject::MovePosition ( Position &  pos,
float  dist,
float  angle,
bool  disableWarning = false 
)
2790{
2791 angle += GetOrientation();
2792 float destx, desty, destz, ground, floor;
2793 destx = pos.m_positionX + dist * cos(angle);
2794 desty = pos.m_positionY + dist * std::sin(angle);
2795
2796 // Prevent invalid coordinates here, position is unchanged
2797 if (!Acore::IsValidMapCoord(destx, desty))
2798 {
2799 if (!disableWarning)
2800 LOG_FATAL("entities.object", "WorldObject::MovePosition invalid coordinates X: {} and Y: {} were passed!", destx, desty);
2801
2802 return;
2803 }
2804
2805 ground = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, MAX_HEIGHT);
2806 floor = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, pos.m_positionZ);
2807 destz = std::fabs(ground - pos.m_positionZ) <= std::fabs(floor - pos.m_positionZ) ? ground : floor;
2808
2809 float step = dist / 10.0f;
2810
2811 for (uint8 j = 0; j < 10; ++j)
2812 {
2813 // do not allow too big z changes
2814 if (std::fabs(pos.m_positionZ - destz) > 6.0f)
2815 {
2816 destx -= step * cos(angle);
2817 desty -= step * std::sin(angle);
2818 ground = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, MAX_HEIGHT);
2819 floor = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, pos.m_positionZ);
2820 destz = std::fabs(ground - pos.m_positionZ) <= std::fabs(floor - pos.m_positionZ) ? ground : floor;
2821 }
2822 // we have correct destz now
2823 else
2824 {
2825 pos.Relocate(destx, desty, destz);
2826 break;
2827 }
2828 }
2829
2830 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(pos.m_positionX);
2831 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(pos.m_positionY);
2832 UpdateGroundPositionZ(pos.m_positionX, pos.m_positionY, pos.m_positionZ);
2833 pos.SetOrientation(GetOrientation());
2834}

)
2874{
2875 angle += GetOrientation();
2876 float destx, desty, destz;
2877 destx = pos.m_positionX + dist * cos(angle);
2878 desty = pos.m_positionY + dist * std::sin(angle);

2883

◆ setActive()

void WorldObject::setActive ( bool  isActiveObject)
1095{
1096 if (m_isActive == on)
1097 return;
1098
1099 if (IsPlayer())
1100 return;
1101
1102 m_isActive = on;
1103
1104 if (on && !IsInWorld())
1105 return;
1106
1107 Map* map = FindMap();
1108 if (!map)
1109 return;
1110
1111 if (on)
1112 {
1113 if (IsCreature())
1114 map->AddToActive(this->ToCreature());
1115 else if (IsDynamicObject())
1116 map->AddToActive((DynamicObject*)this);
1117 else if (IsGameObject())
1118 map->AddToActive((GameObject*)this);
1119 }
1120 else
1121 {
1122 if (IsCreature())
1123 map->RemoveFromActive(this->ToCreature());
1124 else if (IsDynamicObject())
1125 map->RemoveFromActive((DynamicObject*)this);
1126 else if (IsGameObject())
1127 map->RemoveFromActive((GameObject*)this);
1128 }
1129}

◆ SummonCreatureGroup()

void WorldObject::SummonCreatureGroup ( uint8  group,
std::list< TempSummon * > *  list = nullptr 
)

Summons group of creatures. Should be called only by instances of Creature and GameObject classes.

Parameters
groupId of group to summon.
listList to store pointers to summoned creatures.
2446{
2447 ASSERT((IsGameObject() || IsCreature()) && "Only GOs and creatures can summon npc groups!");
2448
2449 std::vector<TempSummonData> const* data = sObjectMgr->GetSummonGroup(GetEntry(), IsGameObject() ? SUMMONER_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT : SUMMONER_TYPE_CREATURE, group);
2450 if (!data)
2451 return;
2452
2453 for (std::vector<TempSummonData>::const_iterator itr = data->begin(); itr != data->end(); ++itr)
2454 if (TempSummon* summon = SummonCreature(itr->entry, itr->pos, itr->type, itr->time))
2455 if (list)
2456 list->push_back(summon);
2457}

2383{
2384 if (!IsInWorld())
2385 return nullptr;
2386
2387 GameObjectTemplate const* goinfo = sObjectMgr->GetGameObjectTemplate(entry);
2388 if (!goinfo)
2389 {
2390 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Gameobject template {} not found in database!", entry);
2391 return nullptr;
2392 }
2393

2397 {
2398 delete go;
2399 return nullptr;
2400 }
2401

2403

2405 if (respawnTime)
2406 go->SetSpellId(1);
2407

2409 ToUnit()->AddGameObject(go);
2410 else
2411 go->SetSpawnedByDefault(false);
2412

2414 return go;
2415}

◆ UpdateAllowedPositionZ()

void WorldObject::UpdateAllowedPositionZ ( float  x,
float  y,
float &  z,
float *  groundZ = nullptr 
) const
1566{
1567 if (GetTransport())
1568 {
1569 if (groundZ)
1570 *groundZ = z;
1571
1572 return;
1573 }
1574
1575 if (Unit const* unit = ToUnit())
1576 {
1577 if (!unit->CanFly())
1578 {
1579 Creature const* c = unit->ToCreature();
1580 bool canSwim = c ? c->CanSwim() : true;
1581 float ground_z = z;
1582 float max_z;
1583 if (canSwim)
1584 max_z = GetMapWaterOrGroundLevel(x, y, z, &ground_z);
1585 else
1586 max_z = ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z);
1587
1588 if (max_z > INVALID_HEIGHT)
1589 {
1590 if (canSwim && unit->GetMap()->IsInWater(unit->GetPhaseMask(), x, y, max_z - Z_OFFSET_FIND_HEIGHT, unit->GetCollisionHeight()))
1591 {
1592 // do not allow creatures to walk on
1593 // water level while swimming
1594 max_z = std::max(max_z - GetMinHeightInWater(), ground_z);
1595 }
1596 else
1597 {
1598 // hovering units cannot go below their hover height
1599 float hoverOffset = unit->GetHoverHeight();
1600 max_z += hoverOffset;
1601 ground_z += hoverOffset;
1602 }
1603
1604 if (z > max_z)
1605 z = max_z;
1606 else if (z < ground_z)
1607 z = ground_z;
1608 }
1609
1610 if (groundZ)
1611 *groundZ = ground_z;
1612 }
1613 else
1614 {
1615 float ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z) + unit->GetHoverHeight();
1616 if (z < ground_z)
1617 z = ground_z;
1618
1619 if (groundZ)
1620 *groundZ = ground_z;
1621 }
1622 }
1623 else
1624 {
1625 float ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z);
1626 if (ground_z > INVALID_HEIGHT)
1627 z = ground_z;
1628
1629 if (groundZ)
1630 *groundZ = ground_z;
1631 }
1632}
Creature::CanSwim
bool CanSwim() const override
This method check the current flag/status of a creature and its inhabit type.
Definition Creature.cpp:3260
